channel.title: client-side on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in client-side on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Intro to IndexedDB
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Overview & When to use IndexedDB IndexedDB is a low-level API for client-side storage like localStorage and cookies. But this built-in non-relational database is much more powerful than those 2 counterparts.
